title: About
text:
The most recent copy of my resume can be found here.
Calvin Carter is a passionate Data Scientist with project experience using Python, R, and PostgreSQL.

Education

University of California, Berkeley   
Master of Arts, Statistics
Expected December, 2025
Relevant Coursework: Introduction to Probability at an Advanced Level, Introduction to Statistics at an Advanced Level, Statistical Computing
University of California, Berkeley   
Bachelor of Arts, Data Science with an emphasis in Applied Mathematics and Modeling
Expected December, 2025
Relevant Coursework: Data Engineering; Data, Inference, and Decisions; Principles and Techniques of Data Science; Data Structures; Concepts in Computing with Data; Linear Programming and Network Flows; Linear Algebra; Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs
Other:
Certification in “Mastering Data Analysis in Excel”, Duke University   


Skills

Programming Languages: Python, R, SQL, Java, C++.
Libraries, Packages, and more: NumPy, Pandas, SciPy, scikit-learn, Tidyverse, R Packages, Quarto, MongoDB.
Other Technical: Data Visualization, Statistical Modeling, Machine Learning, Causal Inference, Git/GitHub.
Soft Skills: Ability to Effectively Communicate, Decision Making, Adaptability, Curiosity, Teaching, Critical Thinking, Attention to Detail, Problem Solving Skills, Focus, Leadership, Presentation, Ambition, Creativity, Collaboration.

text:
